hotels.title: Ajman Private Beach Opulence with Seven Dining Venues & World-Class Spa
hotels.description: Embrace beachfront grandeur at this regal hotel on the pristine shores of the Arabian Gulf. Enjoy the hotel's private shoreline and glistening outdoor pool, or venture to the nearby Ajman Museum for a taste of local history. Savour world-class international dining at Spectrum, dine on classic Italian cuisine at Gioia, catch a game at the Xolo Sports Bar or indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at the Willow Stream Spa. For shopping enthusiasts, the Ajman city centre is just a short drive away.
